articles.title: Brazil, Argentina to discuss common currency to cut reliance on US dollar
articles.description: Brazil and Argentina are planning to create a common currency and the plan will be discussed and officially announced at a summit in Buenos Aires this week, according to a report.
articles.content:
New Delhi: Brazil and Argentina are planning to create a common currency and the plan will be discussed and officially announced at a summit in Buenos Aires this week, according to a report.
The two largest economies in South America will also invite... [1816 chars]

articles.title: Pope makes plea for end of violence, start of talks in Peru
articles.description: Francis, who is a native of Argentina, pointed out that Peruvians were among the faithful in the square on Sunday
articles.content:
Vatican City: Pope Francis on Sunday made an impassioned plea, delivered partly in Spanish, for an end to widening violence in Peru over demands for the resignation of the country’s president.

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans drop to 1-1/2-week low on improved Argentine weather
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Jan 23 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures slid for a fourth consecutive session on Monday to their lowest in more than one week, as expectations of rains in Argentina's parched growing areas eased concerns over supplies.Corn fell to a one-week low, while wheat slid after closing higher on Friday.FUNDAMENTALS* The most-active soybean contract on the Chicago Board of
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, Jan 23 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures slid for a fourth consecutive session on Monday to their lowest in more than one week, as expectations of rains in Argentina's parched growing areas eased concerns over supplies.

articles.title: ‘It’s very difficult’: Hugo Lloris opens up on mental and physical struggles to get over World Cup episode
articles.description: After tasting defeat at the hands of Argentina in the Qatar World Cup final in December, the under-fire star retired from France’s national duty.
articles.content: “That’s the demand of the competition this year. Even if sometimes you can face difficulties you just won’t give up, you want to continue, you want to push and you want to be ready for the important period of the season,” said Hugo Lloris, recalling ... [1212 chars]
